sentences.sContent: My sister puzzles me and causes me anxiety.
sentences.sCn: 我的妹妹常会让我不解，使我焦虑。

sentences.sContent: He thought he had solved the puzzle .
sentences.sCn: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.sContent: ...The puzzle was what benefit would be gained from it when performance might be affected the following day...

synos.tran: 使…困惑；使…为难；苦思而得出

phrases.pCn: n. 七巧板；智力拼图玩具
中国智力玩具（如七巧板、九连环等）；复杂难懂的事物
努力思考；为…烦恼；苦苦思考

words.tran: 困惑的；茫然的；搞糊涂的
使迷惑的；使莫明其妙的

trans.tranOther: If something puzzles you, you do not understand it and feel confused
something that is difficult to understand or explain
